Norwegian Missionary Society lekwasịrị anya na ozi Evangelical-Lutheran na Cameroon site na 1925, ọtụtụ ndị Norwegian na Cameroon bụ ndị ozi ala ọzọ, ọtụtụ n'ime ha dị na Ngaoundéré
Cameroon bụ mba Afrịka nke atọ nwere Norwegian Missionary Society, mgbe South Africa na Madagascar gasịrị

NMS n'onwe ya na-ekwu na ọnụnọ ha na Cameroon bụ "n'ihi ọhụụ ka ukwuu nke iwu belt Bible gafee Africa iji gbochie mmetụta ndị Alakụba na-arịwanye elu site n'ebe ugwu". Ndị ozi ala ọzọ a ma ama gụnyere Halfdan Endresen, onye Cameroon nweere onwe ya ọhụrụ mara mma na 1960 maka mbọ mgbochi ịgba ohu, na Bjørn Bue, onye guzo na Tibati, Yoko na Ngaoundéré ma na-anọchite anya Federation of Protestant Churches and Missions of Cameroon
Mgbe ọ laghachiri Norway ma ghọọ bishọp, Bue nọgidere na-abụ onye isi na-ahazi ihe omume ọdịnala metụtara Cameroon.
Egwuregwu bọọlụ Cameroon ghọrọ ihe a ma ama na Norway mgbe 1986 na 1990 FIFA World Cup gasịrị, ọkachasị na onye edemede Jon Michelet na-egosi Cameroon n'ụzọ dị mma
A haziri egwuregwu enyi na enyi n'etiti Norway na Cameroon n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1990, egwuregwu mbụ Egil Olsen dị ka onye njikwa Norway
Ọtụtụ ndị egwuregwu bọọlụ Cameroon agbaala bọọlụ na Norway na narị afọ nke iri abụọ na otu, ma ndị ikom ma ndị inyom.
Olu Ndị Kraịst na Norway akpọọla ka ndị Norwegian tinye aka na Cameroon, gụnyere enyemaka na azụmahịa. Norway na-arụ ọrụ onye nnọchi anya na Douala na Yaoundé
Banyere ikike mmadụ na Cameroon, Norway nyere onye nta akụkọ Philip Njaru ebe mgbaba onye nwara ịgba ọsọ ndụ na 2008. Ndị ọzọ na-akwaga n'ebe ugwu gụnyere onye egwu Vakoté Yama.
